original_text: Then Amnon said to Tamar, “Bring the food into the chamber, that I may eat from your hand.” And Tamar took the cakes she had made and brought them into the chamber to Amnon her brother.
korean_text: 암논이 다말에게 이르되 음식물을 가지고 침실로 들어오라 내가 네 손에서 먹으리라 하니 다말이 자기가 만든 과자를 가지고 침실에 들어가 그의 오라버니 암논에게 이르러

sentences.original_text: Bring the food into the chamber,
that I may eat from your hand.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네 손에서 먹게 하려 함이라.

sentences.original_text: And Tamar took the cakes she had made
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 다말은 자기가 만든 과자를 가지고,

sentences.original_text: and brought them into the chamber
